text: The flag of Castile and León() is the official flag of the Spanish autonomous community of Castile and León. It consists of the quartered coats of arms of Castile, represented by a castle, and León, represented by a lion. The flag has got four camps, up of red, a white, down of white and red quartering. It was adopted 4 May 2021. ==References== Castile and León Castile and León
title: Flag of Castile and León
